card.name: Aragorn
card.text: Response: After Aragorn commits to a quest, spend 1 resource from his resource pool to ready him.

card.name: Théodred
card.text: Response: After Théodred commits to a quest, choose a hero committed to that quest. Add 1 resource to that hero's resource pool.

card.name: Glóin
card.text: Response: After Glóin suffers damage, add 1 resource to his resource pool for each point of damage he just suffered.

card.name: Gimli
card.text: Gimli gets +1 {attack} for each damage token on him.

card.name: Legolas
card.text: Response: After Legolas participates in an attack that destroys an enemy, place 2 progress tokens on the current quest.

card.name: Thalin
card.text: While Thalin is committed to a quest, deal 1 damage to each enemy as it is revealed by the encounter deck.

card.name: Éowyn
card.text: Action: Discard 1 card from your hand to give Éowyn +1 {will} until the end of the phase. This effect may be triggered by each player once each round.

card.name: Eleanor
card.text: Response: Exhaust Eleanor to cancel the "when revealed" effects of a treachery card just revealed by the encounter deck. Then, discard that card and replace it with the next card from the encounter deck.

card.name: Dúnhere
card.text: Dúnhere can target enemies in the staging area when he attacks alone. When doing so, he gets +1 {attack}.

card.name: Denethor
card.text: Action: Exhaust Denethor to look at the top card of the encounter deck. You may move that card to the bottom of the deck.

card.name: Glorfindel
card.text: Action: Pay 1 resource from Glorfindel's pool to heal 1 damage on any character. (Limit once per round.)

card.name: Beravor
card.text: Action: Exhaust Beravor to choose a player. That player draws 2 cards.

card.name: Faramir
card.text: Action: Exhaust Faramir to choose a player. Each character controlled by that player gets +1 {will} until the end of the phase.

card.name: Son of Arnor
card.text: Response: After Son of Arnor enters play, choose an enemy card in the staging area or currently engaged with another player. Engage that enemy.

card.name: Snowbourn Scout
card.text: Response: After Snowbourn Scout enters play, choose a location. Place 1 progress token on that location.

card.name: Longbeard Orc Slayer
card.text: Response: After Longbeard Orc Slayer enters play, deal 1 damage to each Orc enemy in play.

card.name: Brok Ironfist
card.text: Response: After a Dwarf hero you control leaves play, put Brok Ironfist into play from your hand.

card.name: Ever Vigilant
card.text: Action: Choose and ready 1 ally card.

card.name: Common Cause
card.text: Action: Exhaust 1 hero you control to choose and ready a different hero.

card.name: For Gondor!
card.text: Action: Until the end of the phase, all characters get +1 {attack}. All Gondor characters also get +1 {defence} until the end of the phase.

card.name: Sneak Attack
card.text: Action: Put 1 ally card into play from your hand. At the end of the phase, if that ally is still in play, return it to your hand.

card.name: Valiant Sacrifice
card.text: Response: After an ally card leaves play, that card's controller draws 2 cards.

card.name: Grim Resolve
card.text: Action: Ready all character cards in play.

card.name: Steward of Gondor
card.text: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains the Gondor trait. Action: Exhaust Steward of Gondor to add 2 resources to the attached hero's resource pool.

card.name: Celebrían's Stone
card.text: Attach to a hero. Restricted. Attached hero gains +2 {will}. If attached hero is Aragorn, he also gains a SPI resource icon.

card.name: Gondorian Spearman
card.text: Response: After Gondorian Spearman is declared as a defender, deal 1 damage to the attacking enemy.

card.name: Beorn
card.text: Action: Beorn gains +5 {attack} until the end of the phase. At the end of the phase in which you trigger this effect, shuffle Beorn back into your deck. (Limit once per round.)

card.name: Blade Mastery
card.text: Action: Choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains +1 {attack} and +1 {defence}.

card.name: Rain of Arrows
card.text: Action: Exhaust a character you control with the ranged keyword to choose a player. Deal 1 damage to each enemy engaged with that player.

card.name: Feint
card.text: Combat Action: Choose an enemy engaged with a player. That enemy cannot attack this phase.

card.name: Quick Strike
card.text: Action: Exhaust a character you control to immediately declare it as an attacker (and resolve its attack) against any eligible enemy target.

card.name: Thicket of Spears
card.text: You must use resources from 3 different heroes' pools to pay for this card.. Action: Choose a player. That player's engaged enemies do not attack this phase.

card.name: Swift Strike
card.text: Response: After a character is declared as a defender, deal 2 damage to the attacking enemy.

card.name: Stand Together
card.text: Action: Choose a player. That player may declare any number of his eligible characters as defenders against each enemy attacking him this phase.

card.name: Blade of Gondolin
card.text: Attach to a hero. Restricted. Attached hero gets +1 {attack} when attacking an Orc. Response: After attached hero attacks and destroys an enemy, place 1 progress token on the current quest.

card.name: Citadel Plate
card.text: Attach to a hero. Restricted. Attached hero gets +4 Hit Points.

card.name: Dwarven Axe
card.text: Attach to a hero. Restricted. Attached hero gains +1 {attack}. (+2 ATK instead if attached hero is a Dwarf.)

card.name: Horn of Gondor
card.text: Attach to a hero. Restricted. Response: After a character leaves play, add 1 resource to attached hero's pool.

card.name: Wandering Took
card.text: Action: Reduce your threat by 3 to give control of Wandering Took to another player. Raise that player's threat by 3.

card.name: Lórien Guide
card.text: Response: After Lórien Guide commits to a quest, place 1 progress token on the active location.

card.name: Northern Tracker
card.text: Response: After Northern Tracker commits to a quest, place 1 progress token on each location in the staging area.

card.name: The Galadhrim's Greeting
card.text: Action: Reduce 1 player's threat by 6 or reduce each player's threat by 2.

card.name: Strength of Will
card.text: Response: After you travel to a location, exhaust a SPI character to place 2 progress tokens on that location.

card.name: Hasty Stroke
card.text: Response: Cancel a shadow effect just triggered during combat.

card.name: Will of the West
card.text: Action: Choose a player. Shuffle that player's discard pile back into his deck.

card.name: A Test of Will
card.text: Response: Cancel the "when revealed" effects of a card that was just revealed from the encounter deck.

card.name: Stand and Fight
card.text: Action: Choose an ally with a printed cost of X in any player's discard pile. Put that ally into play under your control (The chosen ally can belong to any sphere of influence.)

card.name: A Light in the Dark
card.text: Action: Choose an enemy engaged with a player. Return that enemy to the staging area.

card.name: Dwarven Tomb
card.text: Action: Return 1 SPI card from your discard pile to your hand.

card.name: Fortune or Fate
card.text: Action: Choose a hero in any player's discard pile. Put that card into play, under its owner's control.

card.name: The Favor of the Lady
card.text: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gains +1 {will}.

card.name: Power in the Earth
card.text: Attach to a location. Attached location gets -1 {threat}

card.name: Unexpected Courage
card.text: Attach to a hero. Action: Exhaust Unexpected Courage to ready attached hero.

card.name: Daughter of the Nimrodel
card.text: Action: Exhaust Daughter of the Nimrodel to heal up to 2 damage on any 1 hero.

card.name: Erebor Hammersmith
card.text: Response: After you play Erebor Hammersmith, return the topmost attachment in any player's discard pile to his hand.

card.name: Henamarth Riversong
card.text: Action: Exhaust Henamarth Riversong to look at the top card of the encounter deck.

card.name: Miner of the Iron Hills
card.text: Response: After Miner of the Iron Hills enters play, choose and discard 1 Condition attachment from play.

card.name: Gléowine
card.text: Action: Exhaust Gléowine to choose a player. That player draws 1 card.

card.name: Lore of Imladris
card.text: Action: Choose a character. Heal all damage from that character.

card.name: Lórien's Wealth
card.text: Action: Choose a player. That player draws 3 cards.

card.name: Radagast's Cunning
card.text: Quest Action: Choose an enemy in the staging area. Until the end of the phase, that enemy does not contribute its {threat}

card.name: Secret Paths
card.text: Quest Action: Choose a location in the staging area. Until the end of the phase, that location does not contribute its {threat}.

card.name: Gandalf's Search
card.text: Action: Look at the top X cards of any player's deck, add 1 of those cards to its owner's hand, and return the rest to the top of the deck in any order.

card.name: Beorn's Hospitality
card.text: Action: Choose a player. Heal all damage on each hero controlled by that player.

card.name: Forest Snare
card.text: Attach to an enemy engaged with a player. Attached enemy cannot attack.

card.name: Protector of Lórien
card.text: Attach to a hero. Action: Discard a card from your hand to give the attached hero +1 {defence} or +1 {will} until the end of the phase.

card.name: Dark Knowledge
card.text: Attach to a hero. Attached hero gets -1 {will}. Response: Exhaust Dark Knowledge to look at 1 shadow card that was just dealt to an enemy attacking you.

card.name: Self Preservation
card.text: Attach to a character. Action: Exhaust Self Preservation to heal 2 points of damage from attached character.

card.name: Gandalf
card.text: At the end of the round, discard Gandalf from play. Response: After Gandalf enters play, (choose 1): draw 3 cards, deal 4 damage to 1 enemy in play, or reduce your threat by 5.

card.name: King Spider
card.text: When Revealed: Each player must choose and exhaust 1 character he controls.

attr.value: Shadow: Defending character must choose and exhaust 1 character he controls. (2 characters instead if this attack is undefended.)

card.name: Hummerhorns
card.text: Forced: After Hummerhorns engages you, deal 5 damage to a single hero you control.

attr.value: Shadow: Deal 1 damage to each character the defending player controls. (2 damage instead if this attack is undefended.)

card.name: Ungoliant's Spawn
card.text: When Revealed: Each character currently committed to a quest gets -1 SPI until the end of the phase.

attr.value: Shadow: Raise defending player's threat by 4. (Raise defending player's threat by 8 instead if this attack is undefended.)

card.name: Great Forest Web
card.text: Travel: Each player must exhaust 1 hero he controls to travel here.

card.name: Mountains of Mirkwood
card.text: Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck and add it to the staging area to travel here. Response: After Mountains of Mirkwood leave play as an explored location, each player may search the top 5 cards of his deck for 1 card and add it to his hand. Shuffle the rest of the searched card back into their owners' decks.

card.name: Eyes of the Forest
card.text: When Revealed: Each player discards all event cards in his hand.

card.name: Caught in a Web
card.text: When Revealed: The player with the highest threat level attaches this card to one of his heroes. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Attached hero does not ready during the refresh phase unless you pay 2 resources from that hero's pool.")

attr.value: Shadow: Wolf Rider attacks the defending player. That player may declare 1 character as a defender. Deal Wolf Rider its own Shadow card. After combat, return Wolf Rider to the top of the encounter deck.

card.name: Hill Troll
card.text: Excess combat damage dealt by Hill Troll (damage that is dealt beyond the remaining hit points of the character damaged by its attack) must be assigned as an increase to your threat.

card.name: Goblin Sniper
card.text: During the encounter phase, players cannot optionally engage Goblin Sniper if there are other enemies in the staging area. Forced: If Goblin Sniper is in the staging area at the end of the combat phase, each player deals 1 point of damage to 1 character he controls.

card.name: Marsh Adder
card.text: Forced: Each time Marsh Adder attacks you, raise your threat by 1.

card.name: Wargs
card.text: Forced: If Wargs is dealt a shadow card with no effect, return Wargs to the staging area after it attacks.

attr.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 {attack}. (+2 ATK instead if this attack is undefended.)

card.name: Despair
card.text: When Revealed: Remove 4 progress tokens from the current quest card. (If there are fewer than 4 progress tokens on the quest, remove all progress tokens from that quest.)

attr.value: Shadow: Defending character does not count its {defence}.

card.name: The Brown Lands
card.text: Forced: After the players travel to The Brown Lands, place 1 progress token on it.

card.name: The East Bight
card.text: When faced with the option to travel, the players must travel to The East Bight if there is no active location.

card.name: Dol Guldur Orcs
card.text: When Revealed: The first player chooses 1 character currently committed to a quest. Deal 2 damage to that character.

attr.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 {attack}. (+3 ATK instead if this attack is undefended.)

card.name: Chieftan Ufthak
card.text: Chieftan Ufthank gets +2 {attack} for each resource token on him. Forced: After Chieftan Ufthak attacks, place 1 resource token on him.

card.name: Dol Guldur Beastmaster
card.text: Forced: After Dol Guldur Beastmaster attacks, deal it 1 additional shadow card.

card.name: Driven by Shadow
card.text: When Revealed: Each enemy and each location currently in the staging area gets +1 {threat} until the end of the phase. If there are no cards in the staging area, Driven by Shadow gains surge.

attr.value: Shadow: Choose and discard 1 attachment from the defending character. (If this attack is undefended, discard all attachments you control.)

card.name: The Necromancer's Reach
card.text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each exhausted character.

card.name: Necromancer's Pass
card.text: Travel: The first player must discard 2 cards from his hand at random to travel here.

card.name: Enchanted Stream
card.text: While Enchanted Stream is the active location, players cannot draw cards.

card.name: Forest Spider
card.text: Forced: After Forest Spider engages a player, it gets +1 {attack} until the end of the round.

attr.value: Shadow: Defending player must choose and discard 1 attachment he controls.
Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 {attack}. (If this attack is undefended, also raise your threat by 3.)

card.name: Black Forest Bats
card.text: When Revealed: Each player must choose 1 character currently committed to a quest, and remove that character from the quest. (The chosen character does not ready.)

card.name: Old Forest Road
card.text: Response: After you travel to Old Forest Road, the first player may choose and ready 1 character he controls.

card.name: Forest Gate
card.text: Response: After you travel to Forest Gate, the first player may draw 2 cards.

card.name: Dungeon Jailor
card.text: Forced: If Dungeon Jailor is in the staging area after the players have just quested unsuccessfully, shuffle 1 unclaimed objective card from the staging area back into the encounter deck.

card.name: Nazgûl of Dol Guldur
card.text: Forced: When the prisoner is "rescued," move Nazgûl of Dol Guldur into the staging area. Forced: After a shadow effect dealt to Nazgûl of Dol Guldur resolves, the engaged player must choose and discard 1 character he controls.

attr.value: Shadow: Choose and discard 1 attachment you control. Discarded objective cards are returned to the staging area. (If this attack is undefended, discard all attachments you control.)

card.name: Under the Shadow
card.text: When Revealed: Until the end of the phase, raise the total {threat} in the stating area by X, where X is the number of players in the game.

attr.value: Shadow: Defending player raises his threat by the number of enemies with which he is engaged.

card.name: Iron Shackles
card.text: When Revealed: Attack Iron Shackles to the top of the first player's deck. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "The next time a player would draw 1 or more cards from the attached deck, discard Iron Shackles instead.")

attr.value: Shadow: Resolve the "When Revealed" effect of Iron Shackles.

card.name: Tower Gate
card.text: Forced:After travelling to Tower Gate, each player places the top card of his deck, face down in front of him, as if it just engaged him from the staging area. These cards are called "Orc Guard," and act as enemies with: 1 hit point, 1 {attack}, and 1 {defence}.

card.name: Gandalf's Map
card.text: Action: Raise your threat by 2 to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. When claimed, attach Gandalf's Map to a hero you control. (Counts as an attachment. If detached, return Gandalf's Map to the staging area.) Attached hero cannot attack or defend.

card.name: Dungeon Torch
card.text: Action: Raise your threat by 2 to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. When claimed, attach Dungeon Torch to a hero you control. (Counts as an attachment. If detached, return Dungeon Torch to the staging area.) Forced: At the end of each round, raise attached hero's controller's threat by 2.

card.name: Shadow Key
card.text: Action: Raise your threat by 2 to claim this objective when it is free of encounters. When claimed, attach Shadow Key to a hero you control. (Counts as an attachment. If detached, return Shadow Key to the staging area.) Forced: At the end of each round, attached hero suffers 1 damage.

card.name: Misty Mountain Goblins
card.text: Forced: After Misty Mountain Goblins attacks, remove 1 progress token from the current quest.

attr.value: Shadow: Remove 1 progress token from the current quest. (3 progress tokens instead if this attack is undefended.)

card.name: Massing at Night
card.text: When Revealed: Reveal X additional cards from the encounter deck. X is the number of players in the game.

attr.value: Shadow: Deal X shadow cards to this attacker. X is the number of players in the game.

card.name: Banks of the Anduin
card.text: Forced: If Banks of the Anduin leaves play, return it to the top of the encounter deck instead of placing it in the discard pile.

card.name: Gladden Fields
card.text: Forced: When Gladden Fields is the active location, each player must raise his threat by an additional point during the refresh phase.

card.name: Eastern Crows
card.text: Forced: After Eastern Crows is defeated, shuffle it back into the encounter deck.

attr.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 {attack} (+2 ATK instead if defending player's threat is 35 or higher.)

card.name: Evil Storm
card.text: When Revealed: Deal 1 damage to each character controlled by each player with a threat of 35 or higher.

card.name: Pursued by Shadow
card.text: When Revealed: Each player raises his threat by 1 for each character he controls that is not currently committed to a quest.

attr.value: Shadow: Defending player chooses and returns 1 exhausted ally he controls to its owner's hand. If he controls no exhausted allies, raise his threat by 3.

card.name: Treacherous Fog
card.text: When Revealed: Each location in the staging area gets +1 {threat} until the end of the phase. Then, each player with a threat of 35 or higher chooses and discards 1 card from his hand.
